settings.heading: Our ingredients
settings.content: From whole food ingredients, cultivated with care, to full-spectrum herbs, we source with nutritional efficacy and environmental impact in mind. Here are all of the powerful plants, herbs and other vital ingredients used in our impactful blends and the nutritional benefits they offer.

settings.heading: Cleansed kanekalon fiber
settings.icon-content:
• The highest quality of synthetic hair is the Kanekalon. Kanekalon hair fibers are heat-friendly so they work with curling irons, blow dryers and hot rollers.

3 Bundle Pack Pre-stretched Hypoallergenic Braiding Hair , Dosso Beauty Braid Box , Marley Hair , Nu Locs Bundle , Pre-Stretched Hypoallergenic Braiding Hair (Single Packs) , River Locs , River Locs Bundle , Soft Locs Kit , Spring Twists

settings.heading: Vitamin E
settings.icon-content:
• A fat-soluble vitamin with several
    forms, but alpha-tocopherol is the only one used by the human body. Its main role is to act as an antioxidant, scavenging loose electrons—so-called “free radicals”—that can damage cells.

Fresh Beard Oil , Ultimate Beard Kit , Matte Liquid Lipstick , Hair Elixir , Kids Conditioner , Kids Curl Cream , Kids Hair Care Bundle , Organic Edge Control , Dosso Loveable Lip Duo , Lustre Lip Gloss

settings.heading: Beeswax
settings.icon-content:
• A natural wax produced by honey bees of the genus Apis. The mixing of pollen oils into honeycomb wax turns the white wax into a yellow or brown color.

Ultimate Beard Kit , Beard Balm , Lip Liner , Organic Edge Control

settings.heading: Castor oil
settings.icon-content:
• A vegetable oil pressed from castor
    beans. It is a colorless or pale yellow liquid with a distinct taste or odor. Castor oil’s fatty acids are natural humectants, substances used to moisturize the skin and hair by preventing water loss, which promotes good skin health, relieves dryness, and soothes skin inflammation.

Ultimate Beard Kit , Hair Elixir , Organic Edge Control

settings.heading: Jojoba oil
settings.icon-content:
• Organic oil that comes from beans of a desert shrub. Jojoba has high levels of vitamin E and is an antioxidant, both of which may prevent scars. Jojoba oil helps with eczema which causes the skin to be dry, itchy, flakey and inflamed.

Fresh Beard Oil , Ultimate Beard Kit , Hair Elixir , Kids Hair Care Bundle , Organic Edge Control , Kids Hair Oil , Kids Shampoo/Body Wash

settings.heading: Shea butter
settings.icon-content:
• A nutrient rich cosmetic butter packed with vitamins and antioxidants. A fat extracted from the nut of an African shea tree. It is used as a moisturizer and also edible, used in food preparation in some African countries.

Ultimate Beard Kit , Kids Conditioner , Kids Hair Care Bundle , Beard Balm , Beard Conditioner , Whipped Shea Butter

settings.heading: Cocoa butter
settings.icon-content:
• A light-yellow vegetable fat that comes from cocoa beans. It is used to make chocolate, as well as some ointments, due to it containing a high amount of fatty acids. A decent source of vitamin E, which benefits your body in many ways. Supports the health of your skin.

Ultimate Beard Kit , Kids Hair Care Bundle , Beard Balm , Kids Shampoo/Body Wash , Whipped Shea Butter

settings.heading: Almond oil
settings.icon-content:
• An oil with a great source of magnesium, phosphorus and copper. RIch in vitamin A, B, and E, which are necessary for healthy skin. Helps to heal sun damage, reduce the signs of aging, and fades scars. Almond oil soaks in quickly and is a powerful moisturizer for the face, hair and body.

Fresh Beard Oil , Ultimate Beard Kit , Hair Elixir , Whipped Shea Butter

settings.heading: Peppermint oil
settings.icon-content:
• Derived from the peppermint plant, a cross between water mint and spearmint. Its used to soothe inflammation, irritation and itchiness on skin and scalp. It promotes wound-healing.               

Hair Elixir , Whipped Shea Butter

settings.heading: Coconut oil
settings.icon-content:
• Derived from the kernels, meat and milk of the coconut palm fruit. Its use to increase shine and protect hair from damage. Helps boost skin health.

Ultimate Beard Kit , Beard Conditioner , Whipped Shea Butter

settings.heading: Sweet Almond oil
settings.icon-content:
• Derived from sweet almonds, rich in nutrients that are good for the skin, including vitamins, minerals, fatty acids and antioxidants. Helps to alleviate dry skin and itching due to inflammatory properties.

Fresh Beard Oil , Ultimate Beard Kit , Hair Elixir , Whipped Shea Butter

settings.heading: Water
settings.icon-content:
• An inorganic compound with the chemical formula H2O.

Ultimate Beard Kit , Kids Conditioner , Kids Hair Care Bundle , Beard Shampoo , Water Wave Crochet Hair , Creamy Concealer , Orange Gel Eye Mask , Kids Curl Cream , Kids Shampoo/Body Wash , Detoxifying Charcoal Mask , Fresh Face Skin Care Products , Hydrating Moisturizer

settings.heading: Charcoal powder
settings.icon-content:
• Fine, orderless, black powder often made from burning organic material such as wood, peat, bamboo or coconut husk. Used to remove unwanted substances.

Detoxifying Charcoal Mask , Fresh Face Skin Care Products

settings.heading: Sunflower oil
settings.icon-content:
• Non-volatile pressed from the seeds of the sunflower. Used for eczema, dry skin

Fresh Beard Oil , Hair Elixir

settings.heading: Jamaican black castor
settings.icon-content:
• Produced by cold pressing fresh castor beans. Used for treating skin infections, healing scars, and acne, moisturizing dry skin, repairing damaged skin, to cleansing and purifying the skin in and out.

Hair Elixir
